sentence: Marchant has said that one of them, Doug Mastriano, is a member of his coalition.

sentence: Recent polling shows State Senator Doug Mastriano, a retired Army colonel with a Ph.D. in history, leading the rest of the Republican candidates.
title: The Most Pivotal Elections in 2022 Are Not the Ones You Think

sentence: Trump's grip on the GOP was further illustrated Tuesday night when Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a strong supporter of Trumps repeated attempts the past year and a half to re-litigate his 2020 election loss, won his primary.

sentence: Republicans are in full-scale panic about Doug Mastriano, the right-wing extremist who won the GOP primary for Pennsylvania governor this week.

sentence: Republicans this week nominated far-right state Sen. Doug Mastriano to be their gubernatorial nominee in Pennsylvania, where the governor appoints the secretary of state.

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Doug Mastriano, who backs Trump's false claims of election fraud and marched to the Capitol on Jan. 6, will be the GOP's gubernatorial candidate.
